Meet Bella!

Hi Friends, I'm Bella.

Bella means "beautiful" in Italian, but my twin brother Billy says my name should mean "meanie." Grrr...he makes me so mad sometimes! I'm a little sensitive and get emotional when he calls me names. My big sister Jayni always tells Billy to stop picking on me.

What's Bella up to today?

Bella's Summer Adventures: Math Lesson 1

Read More
  • More About Bella
  • Things Bella Loves
  • Things Bella Dislikes

I'm always bringing home stray animals. I just can't stand to see them without a home! My mom says we should do what's best for the animals and drop them off at the animal shelter.

I'm a very caring person but I'm also very shy. I don't talk much about my feelings. But, I know that I can always talk to my mom about things. She's the person that I trust the most. She knows all about my quirks, pet peeves. and fears. Once you get to know me, I know you'll just love me!

I like going to school and I love learning through traveling. Traveling and cooking are my favorite hobbies! My creativity always comes out in the kitchen, especially when I bake my awesome brownies! Maybe soon we can share some recipes.

I'm excited to learn about you!

I love exploring new places and meeting new people. My favorite hobbies are:

  • Traveling
  • Cooking
  • Drawing
  • Playing the guitar
  • Being with my friends!

In the Spring, I love to plant pretty flowers and splash in the rain!

During Summer, I love going to the beach with my family. Building sandcastles and collecting sea shells with my brothers and sister is so fun!

My favorite time of year is Fall! I just love going to the cider mill to have apple cider and donuts. We always go apple picking, too!

Since we're inside most of the time during Winter, I love to draw. It really brings out my creativity. When we do bundle up to brave the cold I build snowmen and go ice skating!

What are your favorite things to do?

  • Creepy and slimy bugs scare me!
  • I'm afraid of the dark, but mommy tells me there's nothing to worry about.
  • I really dislike bullies.

What about you? What do you dislike? I would love to hear from you!
